Based on the picture of the food and the reviews on Google my friends and l  went to this restaurant it was clean the staff were nice however the dish that I got which was the mofongo with the white sauce and 6 shrimps was disgusting it was dry it was not seasoned the sauce was bland I did enjoy the Pina colada despite me not being able to taste the liquor the waitress was beautiful I waited about 25 years to finally see New York and to finally taste mofongo and honestly I can say as far as as tasting Mofongo gose I was not impressed with this restaurant food I don't know if the reviews are people that are friends and family as far as I can see that restaurant is very overrated l paid  $38 for mofongo and a pina colada I wish I could give them zero Stars for the food

I visited this restaurant this morning. The food was good. Unfortunately, the woman at the counter who said her name was Joana had a very bad attitude. When I asked for sauce on my rice, she made a face and mumbled under her breath. I spoke with her in Spanish to avoid a language barrier. After I ate my food, I was SHOCKED to see that the tip was included in the bill. I have NEVER seen that for a party of one. When I questioned her about it, she blamed it on the owner and said that‚Äôs how it‚Äôs set in the computer. First, she pointed to the sign indicating the 4% up charge for credit cards. I explained to her that there‚Äôs a difference between 4% and 15%. It made me think she just assumed that I wouldn‚Äôt tip. I do not plan to return.

Had the Mofongo Mocano here and it was delicious! Hands down one of the best Mofongo I've ever had, the cheese definitely kicked it up a notch. The service was also excellent and the outside seating was great. While eating outside it started to downpour and not a drop landed on us! Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a good Mofongo!

Good location. However, we waited 1 hour to be seated and there were obviously plenty of tables available. We told them we wanted to sit and they just kept saying one minute one minute one hour later we were finally seated and the waiter said he never knew we wanted to sit down when he was told one thousand times. There were three of us and they got all of our order wrong and only Two of our orders because they didn‚Äôt know there were three of us. We waited 1 hour for our food and we had to wait another hour for them to give us the correct order. I‚Äôm surprised. It looks like a good place just don‚Äôt go on special occasions because if they‚Äôre busy you‚Äôll have a bad time. The only one who took proper care of us her name is  Ivana great service from her part. She‚Äôs the only reason why i didn‚Äôt stand up and walked out

While I have enjoyed the food, I will not be ordering for delivery again. On the seventeenth of September, 2022, I placed an order via Uber Eats at around 4:40 PM with an estimated delivery time by 5:15. I live less than five blocks away. Upon checking the tracking, the person was traveling the opposite direction, even after giving directions at 5:12. After seeing no movement for more than fifteen minutes, I messaged to inquire concerning the person's general state of being. At 5:43, I phoned the restaurant, was promptly placed on hold, followed by being disconnected when my speech impediment began being noticable. Frustrated, I walked over to the restaurant to address everything. The few positives of this experience is that the host promptly requested a reorder when details of my order were legitimate via their app and presenting the screen from my phone. And I will give a bit of a positive for the person saying sorry on the way out. Otherwise, this was a very lackluster experience of a local establishment. On a side note, at the time of this review (6:27 PM,) I did not see any movement from the delivery person. I sincerely hope he is okay.

Great food and Great prices, i used them for a couple of family events in their downstairs rental hall that went without a hitch. They provided perfect service and were very attentive to my request. On another occasion the owners even provided me catered platters of mini mofongo appetizers for a house party i was attending.
Excelente evento @granparadadominicana ‚ù§Ô∏èüôè DAGITO‚Ä¶

I wish I can give this restaurant ZERO stars for the terrible service I received. I literally walked in the restaurant and it was barely empty and I sat down for the waiter to take my order. The next moment a few people started coming in because of lunch hour but the waiter was no where in site.

I was patiently waiting and a group of 6 came to the restaurant and sat down and out of nowhere the waiter magically appeared after 10-15 minutes of me waiting. He took their order and was attending them even though I and a few other people came ahead of them.

Literally in 5-10 minutes he had brought out food for the group of 6 while I was still waiting for him to attend me. He messed up their order and he immediately fixes their order literally in two point seconds. While I‚Äôm sitting there still waiting for him to take my order.

At that point I was beyond livid because I waited even longer which became 30 minutes waiting for service. I got their first than everybody else and the group of 6. But the waiter didn‚Äôt even look at me or knowledge my presence and the other people that came before the group of 6. He didn‚Äôt give us a menu or a glass of water. But was quick to give them their food and drinks.

A couple that was right next to me were just as livid as I because they were experiencing the same crappy service as well and they proceeded to leave the restaurant. After they left I got inspired to leave as well. I told the waiter sarcastically that I enjoyed the service he provided and he had the audacity to tell me he was going to attend to me after I waited 30 minutes. I ignored him and I proceeded on leaving.

Don‚Äôt waste your time or breath coming to this establishment. If the staff doesn‚Äôt know you personally they aren‚Äôt going to attend to you. That neighborhood barely has any decent restaurants in the area but I rather go to a shady pizzeria and eat at a crappy over cooked slice of pizza with no seasonings than to come to this place ever again.

Delicious shrimp mofongo. Large will feed 2 to 3 people.

If I could give this 0 stars I would. I placed the order at 4:52 and it was supposed to be ready between 5:10 and 5:20. I arrived at 5:18 and was told it would be 5 more minutes. I finally got my order at 6:00, 40 minutes after it was supposed to be ready. Meanwhile half of my order sat on the counter this whole time, the mofongo was cold and dry. I asked about the order various items and was told that they were still working on it. Having to wait 40 for an order is extremely absurd. I would stay as far away from this place as possible. The food may be half decent but the customer service is just horrendous. To top it off, part of the order was wrong.

The worst restaurant I have ever dined in. The service was horrible the waitress had a terrible attitude and no type of experience. Food took forever to come and when the food finally came it was in between cold and warm bottom line not a good place to take the family

Dure esperando 10 min en la entrada y todos los camareros me ve√≠an y nadie me atend√≠a, tuve que ir yo donde ellos, el camarero para nada amable muy ap√°tico, no me pregunto el t√©rmino que quer√≠a para la carne no pregunto nada, m√°s nunca pas√≥ por mesa a recoger ni nada, me sirvieron un jugo p√©simo el cual devolv√≠ y me lo cargaron como quiera. En fin vine a este lugar a desestresarme y pasar un rato agradable y sal√≠ peor. LES DOY UNA ESTRELLA POR QUE NO HAY FORMA DE DARLE 0

Pesimo servicio al cliente cuando pides delivery. La muchacha que te atiende al telefono siempre esta bostezando o atendiendo otros asuntos. El consumo m√≠nimo para delivery depende de quien conteste el telefono. Rara vez te env√≠an lo que‚Ä¶

Primeramente muy malo el servicio, pedimos madumofongo y la mesera luego nos dice que los pl√°tanos maduros se terminaron, a falta de eso ordenamos calamares fritos y cuando estamos terminando llego el mofongo que hab√≠a pedido y el *Madumofongo*, el se√±or que lo lleva, sin pedir permiso retira los calamares que quedaban y quiere imponernos el Madumofongo, le explico que hab√≠a pedido otro plato porque el que quer√≠a no hab√≠a, y en fin puso el plato se llev√≥ los calamares, pedimos que lo pusiera para llevar, pues les cuento que cuando intente probarlo en casa estaba muyyyy malo, la pi√±a colada m√≠a y la margarita de mi esposo estaba horrible. La cuenta s√∫per cara, y al salir se supone que si est√°n en la puerta deben de decir buenas noches, le dimos las gracias por cortes√≠a y el se√±or se qued√≥ mudo. Para mi la peor experiencia que he tenido en un restaurant le doy 0. Si pudiera contactar el due√±o le exhortar√≠a que cambiase el personal completo que estaba ayer.

Amazing Place !! I went for a quick Dinner one Weekend after that I go every weekend Their Customer Service is Excellent and Workers Work as a Team LoveThe Food and Environment wish they play alot More Salsa but Its worth your Time Very Nice Staff and Clean.

My friend decided to bring me here to eat for lunch. I later on learned that another woman took him here and that's how he learned about this place. I just thought that was funny so I decided to include it in my review. Thank you girl, whoever you are, because the food was good. Once we walked into the place, I noticed that there was only one table of customers, family of 3 to be exact. So this place isn't so busy on a Saturday between the hours of 2 and 3 p.m. My friend inquired about a specific soup and the waitress seemed to be confused. I think they both were confused at that time because he's African and doesn't know much about their food and I think the waitress is used to Latino people eating at this place. After all, it is considered to be a Dominican restaurant. Nevertheless, I don't discriminate against food just because it's not culturally related to me. Good food is good food!!! I think she was thrown off by his accent because when I repeated the same thing that he was saying, he just wanted to know what the Dominican soup was made of, she had no problems telling him the contents of the soup. She went to fix his food as I still needed time to decide what I wanted to eat. After looking at the menu, I decided on rice and beans without any meat. The waitress was actually a bit surprised because she even questioned me to make sure that maybe I wasn't forgetting to say I wanted meat. I also decided to go along with a drink they call Topical Mango. I really do think that whoever was responsible for producing the look of the menu, I think they meant to write tropical mango. Because for the life of me, I don't know what the hell a topical mango is. Even my phone wouldn't allow me to spell it the way it's spelled on the menu. I had to go behind the autocorrect and change it from tropical mango to topical mango. Haha. I will have you know that the topical mango was absolutely delicious. It was just a tad bit grainy which was just fine with me. I hate for smoothies to be so thick that it's tough to suck it through the straw. The flavor was absolutely perfect and it was so cold that by the time I finished the drink, I was freezing. Our waitress was absolutely gorgeous. Her skin looked as if you can swim in it. I don't know if you're now viewing me as crazy or just weird as hell, but if you have never witnessed someone with beautiful, Flawless skin... Come here. Her eyebrows were heaven-sent and she had a head full of beautiful hair that was slicked back. Her hips were out of this world and I mean that in a good way. It was as if it doesn't matter what this girl wears, just the silhouette of her body is pleasing to the eyes. Everything from head to toe about her was on point. I remember there was Spanish music playing the whole time. I think that when a place caters to a certain type of crowd or type of people, they forget to include "others". They had two television sets on, but because the music was drowning the sound out, closed captioning was on. Of course the closed captioning was in Spanish. It's a good thing they had something like baseball on because I don't need to know what the hell they're saying to watch baseball.

The food is great they have many items also have a lunch menu. The restaurant has great sitting area, nice decoration , it's clean the food is delicious, but if it's very crowded you're going to have to wait up to 30 minutes so get your food.
The food flavor, texture, look, and smell are great and attention was excellent. Plus the waiting time was not as much as other restaurants doing a well done an juicy stake.

The place is awesome.
Greatest Customer Service.
Food Excellent.
Staffs are very, very Courteous.
Place is very family friendly.
Will recommend as a good place to eat.
